`SpatialData` visualization

plotSpatialData.Rd

...

Usage

plotSpatialData()

# S4 method for class 'SpatialData'
plotImage(x, i = 1, j = 1)

# S4 method for class 'SpatialData'
plotLabel(x, i = 1, c = NULL, a = 0.5, pal = hcl.colors(11, "Spectral"))

# S4 method for class 'SpatialData'
plotPoint(x, i = 1, c = NULL, s = 1, a = 1)

# S4 method for class 'PointFrame'
plotPoint(x, c = NULL, s = 1, a = 1)

# S4 method for class 'SpatialData'
plotShape(x, i = 1, c = NULL, f = "white", s = "radius", a = 0.2)

Value

ggplot

Examples

tf = tempfile()
dir.create(tf)
base = unzip_merfish_demo(tf)
#> returning path to cached zip
(x <- readSpatialData(base, tables=FALSE))
#> class: SpatialData
#> images(1): rasterized
#> labels(0):
#> shapes(2): anatomical cells
#> points(1): single_molecule
#> tables(0):

plotImage(x)
#> [[1]]
